regen.absent_element: saving or storing the configured simulation parameters
regen.new_specification: The system shall save and store the configured simulation parameters for future use.

regen.absent_element: save or confirm changes to simulation parameters
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a mechanism for the user to save or confirm changes made to the simulation parameters.

regen.absent_element: saving or storing the modified simulation parameters and rules
regen.new_specification: The system shall save and store the modified simulation parameters, rules, and other configurations for future use.

label: The user shall be able to modify the simulation rules
absence: action of modify the simulation rules
